totalcross.ui.event

Interface PenListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColorChooserBox, Flick, MaterialEffect, ScrollPosition, SideMenuContainer, ToolTip, Tree

    public interface PenListener
extends EventHandler
    Interface used to listen to Pen events.

    • Method Summary
